examples: Laughter is the best medicine.
Mary broke into laughter.
He wobbled with laughter.
He shook with laughter.
Mary pealed with laughter.
The audience roared with laughter.
I split my sides with laughter.
Laughter is a vent of any sudden joy.
Laughter rippled over the audience.
He went into paroxysms of laughter.
She snorted with laughter.
She gave a squeal of laughter.
I tried to stifle my laughter.
Audiences roared with laughter.
The room reverberated with laughter.
The crowd was helpless with laughter.
He makes audiences howl with laughter.
even in laughter the heart is sorrowful
Laughter animated his face for a moment.
Suddenly, the group burst into laughter.
Theirs was a house filled with laughter.
The room was filled with giddy laughter.
The children's laughter was still ringing in my ears.
Laughter is one of the most infectious expressions of emotion.
He let out a roar of laughter.
Foster joined in the laughter.
He burst into raucous laughter.
He enjoyed the laughter of the crowd.
Alex gave another bellow of laughter.
The whole room rang with their laughter.
example_translate: Слушатели так и покатились со смеху.
Он заставляет зрителей покатиться со смеху.
даже смеясь, сердце плачет от горя
От смеха лицо его на мгновение оживилось.
Детский смех всё ещё звучал в моих ушах.
Смех — это одно из наиболее заразительных проявлений эмоций.
Он разразился хриплым смехом. / Он громко расхохотался.
